readme:
# Underscore

A small package that converts selections of words in underscore_case

## How to activate

Do one or more selections of at least two words separated by a space and then :

* Press Ctrl+Alt+u
* Or use the menu Packages : Underscore - Toggle
* Or use the context menu : Right click - Toggle underscore.

![A screenshot of your package](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/LoicLBD/underscore/master/img/screenshot.png)
